mapper.select:
select to_char(a.cdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') cdate, to_char(a.birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD') birthday,a.ic,b.admin_name admin1_name,c.admin_name admin2_name,d.drug_name,e.factory_name,a.drug_number from t_pharmacy_apply a,t_admin b,t_admin c,t_drug d,t_factory e
a.admin_id1=b.admin_id and a.admin_id2=c.admin_id and a.drug_id=d.drug_id and a.factory_id=e.factory_id and a.state=3 and a.psychotropics='是'
and to_char(a.cdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{start} and #{end}
and d.drug_name like '%${drug_name}%'
order by a.ic asc

select to_char(a.cdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') cdate,a.sold_num,to_char(a.birthday, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birthday,a.price,a.person,a.purpose,b.drug_name,c.admin_name,d.factory_name from t_sold a,t_drug b,t_admin c,t_factory d
a.drug_id=b.drug_id and a.admin_id=c.admin_id and a.factory_id=d.factory_id and a.purpose is not null
and to_char(a.cdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{start} and #{end}
and b.drug_name like '%${drug_name}%'
order by a.person asc

select c.factory_name,b.drug_name,to_char(a.production_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birthday,a.inventory_number from t_inventory a,t_drug b,t_factory c
a.drug_id=b.drug_id and a.factory_id=c.factory_id and b.psychotropics is not null
and b.drug_name like '%${drug_name}%'
order by b.drug_name asc
